content: To obtain the Blood Stained Needle, you need to defeat Zhu Bajie for the second time in The Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow. This is a part of the main chapter progression, so you can't miss it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_Stained_Needle.md', within the main section titled 'Blood Stained Needle'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Blood Stained Needle, you need to defeat Zhu Bajie for the second time in The Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow. This is a part of the main chapter progression, so you can't miss it.
